光.definition: light; ray (CL:道[dao4]); bright; shiny; only; merely; used up; finished; to leave (a part of the body) uncovered

光光.definition: bright; shiny; smooth; naked; bald; penniless

光前裕後.definition: to bring honor to one's ancestors and benefit future generations (idiom)

光化性角化病.pinyin: guāng huà xìng jiǎo huà bìng

光大.definition: splendid; magnificent; abbr. for 中國光大銀行|中国光大银行[Zhong1 guo2 Guang1 da4 Yin2 hang2], China Everbright Bank

光天化日.definition: the full light of day (idiom); fig. peace and prosperity; in broad daylight

光學字符識別.pinyin: guāng xué zì fú shí bié

光宗耀祖.definition: to bring honor to one's ancestors

光山.definition: Guangshan county in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan

光山縣.definition: Guangshan county in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan

光州.definition: Guangzhou, old name for Huangchuan 潢川[Huang2 chuan1] in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan; Gwangju Metropolitan City, capital of South Jeolla Province 全羅南道|全罗南道[Quan2 luo2 nan2 dao4], South Korea

光州市.definition: Guangzhou, old name for Huangchuan 潢川[Huang2 chuan1] in Xinyang 信陽|信阳[Xin4 yang2], Henan; Gwangju Metropolitan City, capital of South Jeolla Province 全羅南道|全罗南道[Quan2 luo2 nan2 dao4], South Korea

光州廣域市.definition: Gwangju Metropolitan City, capital of South Jeolla Province 全羅南道|全罗南道[Quan2 luo2 nan2 dao4], South Korea

光影.definition: light and shadow; sunlight and shade

光復.definition: to recover (territory or power); the liberation of Taiwan from Japanese rule in 1945

光復會.definition: anti-Qing revolutionary party set up in 1904 under Cai Yuanpei 蔡元培[Cai4 Yuan2 pei2]; aka 復古會|复古会[Fu4 gu3 hui4]

光復鄉.definition: Guangfu or Kuangfu township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan

光怪陸離.definition: monstrous and multicolored; grotesque and variegated

光感應.definition: optical response; reaction to light; light sensitive; photoinduction

光明新區.definition: New Guangming district of Shenzhen City 深圳市[Shen1 zhen4 shi4], Guangdong

光明正大.definition: (of a person) honorable; not devious; (of a behavior) fair and aboveboard; without tricks; openly; (of a situation) out in the open

光明磊落.definition: open and candid (idiom); straightforward and upright

光明節.definition: Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar); also called 哈努卡節|哈努卡节 and simply 哈努卡

光桿司令.definition: commander without any soldiers; (fig.) leader without a team; solo entrepreneur

光棍.definition: gangster; hoodlum; bachelor; single man; (dialect) wise person; astute person

光棍兒.definition: bachelor; single man (erhua variant of 光棍[guang1gun4])

光棍節.definition: Singles' Day (November 11), originally a day of activities for single people, but now also the world's biggest annual retail sales day

光氣.definition: phosgene COCl2, aka carbonyl chloride, a poisonous gas

光澤縣.definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian

光環.definition: ring of light; halo; (fig.) glory; splendor

光盤.definition: compact disc (CD); DVD; CD-ROM; CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]

光盤驅動器.definition: CD or DVD drive; abbr. to 光驅|光驱

光碟.definition: optical disc; compact disc; CD; CD-ROM; CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]

光祿勳.definition: Supervisor of Attendants in imperial China, one of the Nine Ministers 九卿[jiu3 qing1]

光祿大夫.definition: honorific title during Tang to Qing times, approx. "Glorious grand master"

光禿禿.definition: bald; bare (no hair, no leaves, no vegetation etc)

光緒.definition: reign name of penultimate Qing emperor Guangxu or Guang-hsu (1875-1908)

光線.definition: light ray; CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]; light; illumination; lighting (for a photograph)

光纖分佈數據接口.pinyin: guāng xiān fēn bù shù jù jiē kǒu

光纖分布式數據接口.pinyin: guāng xiān fēn bù shì shù jù jiē kǒu

光纖分散式資料介面.pinyin: guāng xiān fēn sǎn shì zī liào jiè miàn

光耀門楣.definition: splendor shines on the family's door (idiom); fig. to bring honor to one's family

光耦.definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]

光背地鶇.definition: (bird species of China) plain-backed thrush (Zoothera mollissima)

光腚腫菊.definition: (Internet slang) punning reference to 廣電總局|广电总局[Guang3 dian4 Zong3 ju2], the National Radio and Television Administration (NRTA)

光腳的不怕穿鞋的.pinyin: guāng jiǎo de bù pà chuān xié de
光腳的不怕穿鞋的.definition: lit. the barefooted people are not afraid of those who wear shoes (idiom); fig. the poor, who have nothing to lose, do not fear those in power

光膀子.definition: bare upper body; bare-chested; to bare one's chest

光臨.definition: (formal) to honor with one's presence; to attend

光芒.definition: rays of light; brilliant rays; radiance

光說不做.definition: (idiom) to be all talk and no action; to preach what one does not practice

光說不練.definition: all talk and no action (idiom); to preach what one does not practice; same as 光說不做|光说不做[guang1 shuo1 bu4 zuo4]

光貓.definition: optical network terminal (ONT); optical network unit (ONU); optical modem

光追.definition: ray tracing (abbr. for 光線追蹤|光线追踪[guang1xian4 zhui1zong1])

光陰似箭.definition: time flies like an arrow (idiom); How time flies!

光頭.definition: shaven head; bald head; to go bareheaded; hatless

光頭強.definition: Logger Vick (Boonie Bears character); nickname for bald people

光風霽月.definition: lit. light breeze and clear moon (idiom); period of peace and prosperity; noble and benevolent character

光驅.definition: CD or DVD Drive; abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
